resources.string:
We're glad you asked. 
Here are the basics to being #trendy. 
Outfits are referred to as Looks, and your favorite Looks are referred to as Gems ( ). 

The Add icon ( ) allows you to take a photo of your current Look. 
The Calendar icon ( ) brings you to a page where you can check past Looks: 
• A shaded day ( ) indicates a Look was recorded 
• A blank day ( ) has no recorded Look 
• A pink square ( ) means that a Gem was created on that day 

Pretty simple huh? 
If you have any other questions or comments check out our Facebook page! Stay #Trendy.
